name: Escape The Castle (Sunless Interactive)
description:
Run away from the castle avoid the objects on the pathways though or you'll be in trouble, Get yourself away from the evil clutch of the king.

Lesson learned don't steal from the king or he'll chase you and imprison you for a long time guess you're going to be on the run for the rest of your life lets see how far you can get and see if you can beat your friends.
